Verify the 'Dashboard' item becomes active with background color #007bff and padding 12px

Verify the current image in the carousel has source 'carousel_slide_1.jpg', alt text 'Scenic landscape', aria-label 'Current slide 1 of 3', border radius 8px, and is loaded

Verify the heading 'Latest Articles' has font size 24px, color #333333, font family 'Merriweather', text align left, and is visible
